title: Zelda Twilight Princess HD Remastered for PC - Install and Play
description:
This is a preconfigured install for The Legend of Zelda the Twilight Princess HD with several HD texture packs, SweetFX, Reshade, and much more.  The various features require very specific emulator versions, settings and plug ins. It can be very complicated to get everything working so I have decided to pack it all up in a release.  

There is no better way to play this game.  The Zelda hacking community took it to a whole new level!


Just install and run the game exe file just like any other PC game.  The emulator, and all game specific settings have all been wrapped in the games exe and install for easy install and use.



Configured to use a standard PC controller (xbox360, etc)
